title: This Amateur Just Broke the Strava Record on the Mortirolo: Ready for the WorldTour?
content:
Jack Burke, a Canadian well-known on the North American circuit, has been smashing Strava records across Europe. Now he wants to join the WorldTour: 'Letâ€™s hope some kind of opportunity comes from this.'

Read the full article at This Amateur Just Broke the Strava Record on the Mortirolo: Ready for the WorldTour? on Velo.
author: ahood
